The claim was based on a tweet by Tracy: a Trump Victory Committee field organizer, who accused CBS of stealing a photo from Latinos for Trump and tagging it as a Biden event.
The claim was further promoted by Brad P: a senior adviser to President Trump's reelection campaign, Kelli Ward, chairperson of the Arizona Republican Party, and Drew Sexton, Arizona state director for the Trump Victory Committee.
The unreliable right: wing conspiracy website Gateway Pundit and the website Red State Nation published articles supporting the claim.
The expert: s investigation found that the claim was false, as the photograph used by CBS was authentic and taken at a Latinos for Trump event in Phoenix, Arizona, while the chyron on the screen referred to Biden's campaign stop in Florida.
